about_the_game:
Sexy Secrets is an adult content pack for the Maid Cafe game that extends multiple different scenes and events within the game, expanding on them to include more adult content between the protagonist and a variety of characters who appear throughout the game, adding new sexy secret events.

By purchasing and installing the pack it adds new adult scenes and extended story content featuring:
  • Natalia
  • Hailie
  • Claire
  • Spider
  • Angela

content_descriptors.notes:
This product depicts various sexual acts and sequences between a man and a woman, in the form of new events that appear seamlessly within the game.

All characters included are over the age of 21.

The DLC adds new content to the game: Maid Cafe.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
